class sprite.Mob(screen)¶

Bases: pygame.sprite.Sprite

This class defines a mob.

METHODS

Mob.update()

Mob.rotate()


ATTRIBUTES

Mob.image_orig

Mob.image

Mob.rect

Mob.speed_x

Mob.speed_y

Mob.rot

Mob.rot_speed

Mob.last_update

Mob.damage


image_orig¶
A mobs image.

image¶
A copy of image_orig (for image rotation).

rect¶
The rect of mob surface.

speed_x: int¶
The speed of horizontal mob  moving.

speed_y: int¶
The speed of vertical mob moving.

rot: int = 0¶
The initial rotation angle.

rot_speed: int¶
The angle of mob rotation.

last_update: int¶
Time of mob updating.

damage = 10¶
The mob gamage (class attribute).
type

int


rotate()¶

This method defines mob rotation.


update(screen)¶

This method defines mob updating.

Param

screen: The mob rendering screen.


class sprite.Player(screen)¶

Bases: pygame.sprite.Sprite

This class defines the player.

METHODS

Player.update()

Player.shoot()

Player.hide()

Player.powerup()


ATTRIBUTES

Player.image

Player.icon

Player.rect

Player.helth

Player.shoot_delay

Player.last_shoot

Player.lives

Player.hidden

Player.hide_timer

image¶
The player image.

icon¶
The player icon.

rect¶
The rect of player surface.

speed_x: int = 8¶
The speed of horizontal player moving.

health_max: int = 100¶
The maximum value of player health.

health: int = 100¶
The player health.

shoot_delay: int = 250¶
Delay between shots.

last_shot: int¶
Time of last shot.

lives: int = 3¶
Count of player lives.

hidden: bool = False¶
The flag of player hiding.

hide_timer: int¶
Time of last player hiding.

power: int = 1¶
The player power.

power_time: int = 5000¶
The delay of power.

hide()¶

This method defines player hiding.


powerup()¶

This method defines player power up.


shoot()¶

This method defines player shooting.

Param

args: Groups of sprites, where a bullet will be added.


update(screen)¶

This method defines player updating.

Param

screen: The player rendering screen.


sprite.all_sprites = <Group(1 sprites)>¶

The group of all sprites.


sprite.bonuses = <Group(0 sprites)>¶

The group of all bonuses.


sprite.bullets = <Group(0 sprites)>¶

The group of all bullets.


sprite.mobs = <Group(0 sprites)>¶

The group of mobs.


sprite.new_mob(count)¶

Generating new instance of class Mob in personage module.

Param

count:Count to mobs generation.
